description:
Navigate and refactor your code with ease

An IDE built on top of a canvas, Haystack takes care of the tedious and confusing parts of coding for you
Some fixes:
1. Fixed auth issues with Haystack pull requests
   1. This removes the need for write access for unnecessary parts of GitHub
2. Added incoming caller arrows to symbols in Solidity
3. Added Ruby to list of languages that Haystack Pull Request supports
